name: user_account
description: Manages user accounts, profiles, subscriptions, and notification preferences within the e-commerce system.

skills.name: Update User Profile
skills.description: Updates specific fields in a user's profile.
examples: Update my address to 123 Main St

skills.name: Manage Subscriptions
skills.description: Allows users to manage their subscription status or preferences.

skills.name: Send Notification
skills.description: Sends a notification to the user through their preferred channel.
examples: Send me an email about order updates
